metadata.title: Whistleblower lawsuit claims Figure AI robots have the strength to fracture skulls
metadata.description: Former safety chief claims Figure AI's humanoid robots can fracture skulls and alleges he was fired for raising concerns. The robotics startup, now valued at $39 billion with backing from Nvidia and Jeff Bezos, denies wrongdoing and cites poor performance as the reason for termination.
metadata.keywords: Figure AI, humanoid robots, robot safety, workplace safety, whistleblower, wrongful termination, Robert Gruendel, Brett Adcock, Nvidia, Jeff Bezos, Microsoft, robotics startup, AI safety, product safety, skull fracture, robot malfunction, safety concerns, AI regulation, humanoid robotics, automation safety, tech whistleblower, Figure robotics, AI investment, robotics industry, workplace injury risk, robot deployment,notebook, laptop, review, reviews, tests, test, reports, netbook, benchmarks, graphics card, processor
